TopicTitle: How to use the EVA jet pack?

Articles.Content: Just as the question asks, how do I use an EVA jet pack? Also, is there a list of controls somewhere?

Check under settings for keymappings. That's the best place to find information on that stuff.

For EVE, WSAD for movement and CTRL and SHIFT for Up and Down.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Jet packs don't work very well on the surface of Kerbin either.. due to Kerbins heavier gravity
Also, unlike the normal controls, in this case WASD are relative to the camera angle.
